remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將在頁面上的驗證控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以單獨在頁面上的其他驗證群組進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的 [更新] 按鈕中之驗證群組的名稱物件會驗證在回傳至伺服器時。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the Update button in an object causes validation when it posts back to the server. 屬性沒有作用時，才的值屬性設定為`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只會驗證指定的群組中的控制項驗證更新中的按鈕時回傳至伺服器的物件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the Update button in an object posts back to the server. 如果您未指定的值屬性和屬性設定為`true`，會驗證所有頁面上不會指派給驗證群組的驗證控制項中 [更新] 按鈕時物件回傳至伺服器。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the Update button in an object posts back to the server. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state.
